title: Create a Change Order for Added Scope
description: The client has requested to add a patio, which was not in the original scope. A project manager must create a change order.

tasks.description: Create a new change order document.
tasks.expected_outcome: A blank change order form is generated with a unique ID.

tasks.description: Price the new scope, calculating a cost of $8,000 for materials and labor, plus a 15% markup.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total price for the change order is calculated as $9,200.

tasks.description: Submit the change order to the client for approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: The completed change order is sent to the client.
